teiid-property.name: cache-metadata
teiid-property.description: Can be true or false. defaults to false for -vdb.xml deployments otherwise true. If false, Teiid will obtain metadata once for every launch of the vdb. true will save a file containing the metadata into the PROFILE/data/teiid director

teiid-property.name: query-timeout
teiid-property.description: Sets the default query timeout in milliseconds for queries executed against this VDB. 0 indicates that the server default query timeout should be used. Defaults to 0. Will have no effect if the server default query timeout is set to a lesser value. N

teiid-property.name: lib
teiid-property.description: Set to a list of modules for the vdb classpath for user defined function loading. See also Support for User-Defined Functions (Non-Pushdown).

teiid-property.name: security-domain
teiid-property.description: Can be true or false. defaults to false for -vdb.xml deployments otherwise true. If false, Teiid will obtain metadata once for every launch of the vdb. true will save a file containing the metadata into the PROFILE/data/teiid director

teiid-property.name: connection.xxx
teiid-property.description: Can be true or false. defaults to false for -vdb.xml deployments otherwise true. If false, Teiid will obtain metadata once for every launch of the vdb. true will save a file containing the metadata into the PROFILE/data/teiid director

teiid-property.name: authentication-type
teiid-property.description: Can be true or false. defaults to false for -vdb.xml deployments otherwise true. If false, Teiid will obtain metadata once for every launch of the vdb. true will save a file containing the metadata into the PROFILE/data/teiid director

teiid-property.name: password-pattern
teiid-property.description: Can be true or false. defaults to false for -vdb.xml deployments otherwise true. If false, Teiid will obtain metadata once for every launch of the vdb. true will save a file containing the metadata into the PROFILE/data/teiid director

teiid-property.name: gss-pattern
teiid-property.description: Can be true or false. defaults to false for -vdb.xml deployments otherwise true. If false, Teiid will obtain metadata once for every launch of the vdb. true will save a file containing the metadata into the PROFILE/data/teiid director

teiid-property.name: model.visible
teiid-property.description: Can be true or false. defaults to false for -vdb.xml deployments otherwise true. If false, Teiid will obtain metadata once for every launch of the vdb. true will save a file containing the metadata into the PROFILE/data/teiid director

teiid-property.name: include-pg-metadata
teiid-property.description: Can be true or false. defaults to false for -vdb.xml deployments otherwise true. If false, Teiid will obtain metadata once for every launch of the vdb. true will save a file containing the metadata into the PROFILE/data/teiid director

teiid-property.name: lazy-invalidate
teiid-property.description: Can be true or false. defaults to false for -vdb.xml deployments otherwise true. If false, Teiid will obtain metadata once for every launch of the vdb. true will save a file containing the metadata into the PROFILE/data/teiid directory
